%sh
###Add the shell interpreter -> https://hortonworks.com/tutorial/getting-started-with-apache-zeppelin/#creating-an-interpreter 
####Verify that the files you need are in hdfs:
pwd
ls -l
hadoop fs -ls /tmp/StormEvents

//download and combine the stormevents details files
val stormevents_details = spark.read.option("header", "true").csv("hdfs:///tmp/StormEvents/StormEvents_details-ftp_v1.0_*.csv.gz")
//Preview and provide size estimate for combined file
stormevents_details.limit(5).show()
println(stormevents_details.count())
import org.apache.spark.util.SizeEstimator
println(SizeEstimator.estimate(stormevents_details))
